description.text:
-The pixie sighs- You're still alive?...Why do you keep persisting, Mortal. 
Thou as much as I would like to be your friend. 
Your presence in the mortal realm is required. 
Maybe we should postpone our friendship...
and strengthen your soul by keeping it bound to a $(b;winter)grave stone$().
So...why don't you $(b;spring)craft$() your final resting place, Mortal...

That looks comfortable...I envy you, Mortal...
a nice place to rest...
-The pixie considers taking a nap on your grave-
